results.title: [Idiopathic right ventricular tachycardia or arrhythmogenic right ventricular tachycardia?].
results.text_hl: TREATMENT AND COURSE: @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Outflow_Obstruction_Right</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092243 @@@Idiopathic right-ventricular outflow tract tachycardia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Outflow_Obstruction_Right</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092243 @@@IRVT@@@) having been diagnosed, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was put on a maintenance dose of 50 mg/d @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Kuhn A, Kottkamp H, Thiele H, Schuler G, Hindricks G. [Idiopathic right ventricular tachycardia or arrhythmogenic right ventricular tachycardia?]. Dtsch Med Wochenschr. 2000 Jun 2;125(22):692-7. PMID: 10874896
citations.BibTeX: @article{10874896, title={[Idiopathic right ventricular tachycardia or arrhythmogenic right ventricular tachycardia?].}, author={Kuhn A and Kottkamp H and Thiele H and Schuler G and Hindricks G}, journal={Dtsch Med Wochenschr}, volume={125}, number={22}, pages={692-7}}

results.title: Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: She was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and the class Ia antiarrhythmic drug @CHEMICAL_cifenline @CHEMICAL_MESH:C032151 @@@cibenzoline@@@ to relieve the @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Outflow_Obstruction_Right</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092243 @@@outflow tract obstruction@@@, and the pressure gradient was reduced to 70 mmHg.

citations.NLM: Kubo T, Kitaoka H, Terauchi Y, Tamura S, Okawa M, Yamasaki N, Yabe T, Doi YL. Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy. J Cardiol. 2010 Jan;55(1):125-9. PMID: 20122559
citations.BibTeX: @article{20122559, title={Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy.}, author={Kubo T and Kitaoka H and Terauchi Y and Tamura S and Okawa M and Yamasaki N and Yabe T and Doi YL}, journal={J Cardiol}, volume={55}, number={1}, pages={125-9}}
